item.title: Books
item.description: This is a list of books I have read recently/books I am reading at the moment. Some of these are in Dutch Fiction Ken Follett - A Column of Fire (EN) / Het eeuwige vuur (NL) Ilja Leonard Pfeijffer - Grand Hotel Europa Non-Fiction Steven D. Levitt, Stephen J. Dubner - Freakonomics: A Rogue Economist Explores the Hidden Side of Everything

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my personal website, this is a place where I intend to share about myself, my interests and general things that come to my mind. If you want to know more about me, check out the About page. The website has 2 sections at the moment. Blog: Posts about life and things in my areas of interest. Lists: Personal reccomendation lists for various topics (books, films, music I like…).
